name: Oroborascion, Etherym of Time Eternal
text: 3 Etherym monsters This monster is unaffected by your opponent's spell/trap effects. You can only use the following effects of "Oroborascion, Etherym of Time Eternal" once per turn. If your opponent would summon a monster; (quick effect) you can banish 1 monster you control or in your gy: negate the summon and if you do, banish the monster. If this monster is banished: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it.
